question: Numbers between 1 to 1000 which are divisible by 7?
explanation: Because to get numbers between 1 to 1000 which are divisible by 7 can be calculated very easily just only by dividing 1000 by 7, 1000/7=142.8571, so 142 numbers are there between 1 to 1000 are  divisible by 7, thus option (b) is the right answer.
